sys_script.name: Revert Donator Name Changes

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_78c9cc4193f90a1094e3f15a7bba106a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383184_charityb_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Revert Donator Name Changes</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
    // Check if the Donator field is read-only
    var donatorField = current.donator.getGlideObject();
    if (donatorField.isReadOnly()) {
        // Donator field is read-only, so do not revert changes
        return;
    }

    // Revert Donator name changes
    if (current.donator != previous.donator) {
        current.donator = previous.donator;
        gs.addInfoMessage("Donator name cannot be changed. Reverted back to original value.");
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-24 07:43:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>78c9cc4193f90a1094e3f15a7bba106a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Revert Donator Name Changes</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_78c9cc4193f90a1094e3f15a7bba106a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-21 05:58:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=78c9cc4193f90a1094e3f15a7bba106a"/></record_update>
